aka: 五时至七时的克利奥：回忆与逸事

cast.name: 多萝泰·布兰克 Dorothée Blanck
安托万·布尔塞耶 Antoine Bourseiller
马兰·卡尔米兹 Marin Karmitz
科琳娜·马尔尚 Corinne Marchand
阿涅斯·瓦尔达 Agnès Varda

director.name: 阿涅斯·瓦尔达 Agnès Varda

this_title: Cléo de 5 à 7: souvenirs et anecdotes
trans_title: 五至七时的克莱奥：回忆与逸事
五时至七时的克利奥：回忆与逸事
introduction: More than 40 years after making "Cléo de 5 à 7," Agnès Varda invites her star, two other cast members, and her assistant directors to look back. She takes us through the film, from opening scene to the end, visiting its Paris locales, placing her aged actors in the same spots, telling stories, and listening to others' reflections on the making of the film. She and they talk about making a film on a low budget, its showing at Cannes, and trying to fix a problem in the last shot. Her assistant directors discuss casting, costumes, sets, and the ways the film changed their approaches to filmmaking. Scenes from "Cléo" are included throughout the documentary.
chinese_title: 五至七时的克莱奥：回忆与逸事
foreign_title: Cléo de 5 à 7: souvenirs et anecdotes
